title: Hour 1 - Bubba Wallace (06-24-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Bubba Wallace (06-24-20)
description:
Bubba Wallace tells Dan that he was told by Nascar that his pull rope was tied in the form of a noose. The FBI has determined that this was not a hate crime towards Bubba Wallace. Bubba Says he saw the picture and his pull rope was tied a s a noose while other pull ropes were not tied at all.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Bubba Wallace tells Dan that he was told by Nascar that his pull rope was tied in the form of a noose. The FBI has determined that this was not a hate crime towards Bubba Wallace. Bubba Says he saw the picture and his pull rope was tied a s a noose while other pull ropes were not tied at all.
